page.title: 02A DAY AT A PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: I get up at about 7.20, wash and dress, have breakfast which is usually Weetabix and a drink, then I get on the coach that takes me to school (Bedding- ton Park Farm Primary School). I have to travel on the coach because there is no public transport and we live on a small housing estate a couple of miles from the school. My lessons are usually Maths, then playtime, followed by English and read- ing. Lunch break is at 12.00 and ends at 1.20. After that we have general studies and we go home at 3.15. I go home on the coach, change, and go out to play with my friend Ben. I come in at 5.30 for my tea. Then I either watch television, help my mum with my baby brother or go out to play again. Bedtime is usually about 9 o'clock.
